reasoning_chain: Bootleg Fire: 3 (high severity) x 41.38 (normalized acres) x 1.0 (in_restoration) = 124.1
Cedar Creek Fire: 3 (high severity) x 12.73 (normalized acres) x 1.25 (baer_implementation) = 47.8
McKay Creek Fire: 4 (critical severity) x 2.5 (normalized acres) x 2.0 (active) = 20.0
expected_output.summary: 3 fires analyzed. Bootleg Fire ranks highest with score 124.1.

notes: Bootleg ranks highest due to large size (413k acres = 41.38 normalized) despite being in restoration
McKay Creek has highest phase multiplier (active) but smaller footprint
BAER assessment phase fires should be flagged as time-critical regardless of absolute score
Note: Acres cap at 50 normalized (500k acres) per mission.ts formula
